item.title: Creating a WARC from a Wordpress Clone
item.description: This blog post chronicles portions of a process used to restore and subsequently WARC (the creation of a web archive) a Communication Department website that had been retired. The website content of interest included material describing plans for the recently-completed HSSC and Administration Building projects. During the restoration and WARC process a .md document named WARC-from-comm.sites.grinnell.edu-clone.md was created and it’s contents are presented here. Creating a WARC from a Clone of comm.sites.grinnell.edu In July 2022 a new “clone” of the original comm.
